statements: DELETE FROM job_market_data WHERE job_title='Software Engineer';
DELETE FROM job_market_data WHERE job_location='San Francisco';
DELETE FROM job_market_data WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer' AND company_name = 'Tech Inc';
DELETE FROM job_market_data WHERE salary_range = '$50,000 - $70,000' AND job_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM job_postings WHERE job_title = 'Software Engineer'
DELETE FROM job_skills WHERE skill_name = 'Python' AND skill_level = 'Advanced';
DELETE FROM jobs WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc' AND job_title = 'Software Engineer';
DELETE FROM jobs WHERE job_id = 10 AND company_name = 'ABC Corp';
